LanguageData.SydailyOnCheek_Left.label: Sydaily Crystal【left】
LanguageData.SydailyOnCheek_Left.description: This is the crystal on the left cheek of SydailyFox, \n\nIt's cold to the touch...Pray the Fox won't catch a cold~
LanguageData.SydailyOnCheek_Right.label: Sydaily Crystal【right】
LanguageData.SydailyOnCheek_Right.description: This is the crystal on the right cheek of SydailyFox, \n\nAnd cold to the touch.
